Tagline: Electronics Solutions on a Fast Track™
Overview:
MJS Designs, Inc. is a leading electronics manufacturing services provider (EMS). Based in Phoenix, Arizona, MJS Designs has been partnering with leading manufacturers across the globe since 1976 to deliver high-quality engineering services including: circuit board design, fabrication, assembly, and test. From engineering concept to prototype/production, MJS Designs clients gain access to state-of-the-art equipment, process knowledge and technical expertise, receiving leading-edge quality and enhanced time-to-market while saving significant capital investment. MJS Designs is ISO-9001 certified and adheres to a stringent Quality Management System (QMS) protocol. With over 45 years of experience in the industry, our team of experts are passionate about helping our clients succeed - no matter what challenge they face.

MJS Designs...Electronics Solutions on a Fast Track™. 


Specialties

MJS Designs Services:
 - Electrical and Mechanical Engineering
 - CAD Layout (Allegro, PADS, Xpedition, Altium)
 - PCB Fabrication (Rigid, Rigid/Flex, Flex)
 - Parts Procurement
 - Assembly (Rigid, Rigid/Flex, Flex)
 - Functional and Flying Probe Test
 - BGA Removal/Replace/Solder Ball Attach
 - X-Ray
 - Box Build
 - Fulfillment Capabilities
 - 3D Printing
